title: Help Neighbors in Need
content:
When neighbors hit hard times, your support of Portland Rescue Mission provides the care they need in crisis.

Your donation of $24 provides two nights of care – a hearty meal, hot shower, clean clothes, and a safe night’s rest.

For many people, that’s enough to spark hope for a better life. Thanks to your gift, they can start a new life in our wide range of recovery programs.

Lives are changing at Portland Rescue Mission! Please help as many people as possible with a generous gift today.

(Special thanks to Edward Wadsworth for Hair for your Care Partner support!)
